summary: An email from attorney Jack Scarola to an FBI agent (EMMI) requesting information to corroborate a client's account of interactions with Jeffrey Epstein in early 2003. The request seeks confirmation of travel arrangements and documents related to the investigation.

persons.name: Jack Scarola
persons.context: Attorney from the law firm Searcy Denney Scarola Barnhart & Shipley, P.A. who sent the email requesting information from the FBI to corroborate his client's account of interactions with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the investigation; the email seeks to corroborate a client's interaction with him regarding travel arrangements he allegedly paid for in early 2003.

persons.name: Chris R. Rodgers
persons.context: Listed as CC recipient on the email from Jack Scarola requesting information about the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: EMMI
persons.context: Primary recipient of the email from attorney Jack Scarola; likely an FBI agent or investigator involved in the Epstein case, as the request is for investigative documents.

connections.description: Attorney Scarola is requesting investigative information from FBI agent/investigator EMMI regarding his client's case involving Jeffrey Epstein.
Scarola is investigating Epstein's alleged actions on behalf of his client, seeking to corroborate travel and interactions.

events.title: Client's Interaction with Epstein
events.description: A client of attorney Jack Scarola reported an interaction with Jeffrey Epstein, involving alleged travel arrangements paid for by Epstein.

events.title: Epstein's Return from Paris
events.description: Epstein allegedly returned from Paris around the same timeframe as the client's reported interaction, which the attorney seeks to confirm.

keyFacts: Attorney Jack Scarola requested FBI assistance in February 2021 to corroborate a client's account of interactions with Jeffrey Epstein in early 2003.
The request sought confirmation of travel arrangements allegedly paid for by Epstein, including a flight and a helicopter transport to Palm Beach.
Scarola also requested confirmation of Epstein's return from Paris in the same timeframe and copies of statements given to federal investigators.
The email indicates ongoing legal efforts in 2021 to gather evidence related to Epstein's activities from 2003.
